text: Thomas Emmet "Tom" Hayden (December 11, 1939 - October 23, 2016) was an American social and political activist, author and politician. He was director of the Peace and Justice Resource Center in Los Angeles County, California. He was a member of the Chicago Seven. Hayden was best known for his major role as an anti-war, civil rights and radical intellectual counterculture activist. Hayden was the former husband of actress Jane Fonda and the father of actor Troy Garity. Hayden died in Santa Monica, California from heart disease and from complications of a stroke on October 23, 2016, aged 76. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American civil rights activists Category:American human rights activists Category:American LGBT rights activists Category:American political activists Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Detroit Category:State legislators of the United States
